message: Thanks for the response, it helps. For (1) I recall reading I think somewhere in your blogs, I think this one: [http://blog.stephencleary.c...](http://blog.stephencleary.com/2012/09/introduction-to-dataflow-part-2.html "http://blog.stephencleary.com/2012/09/introduction-to-dataflow-part-2.html") that the BufferBlock is a simple first in, first out data container, hence I was wondering if it is similar to queue in that regard.
